org.xadisk.filesystem.standalone
Class StandaloneFileSystemConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.xadisk.filesystem.FileSystemConfiguration
      org.xadisk.filesystem.standalone.StandaloneFileSystemConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class StandaloneFileSystemConfiguration
extends FileSystemConfiguration

This class represents the configuration object required for booting an XADisk instance.

When XADisk is not used as a JCA Resource Adapter, XADisk uses its own thin implementation of WorkManager (which is otherwise available from the JavaEE Server due to JCA contract). This WorkManager implementation relies on a JDK utility called ThreadPoolExecutor.

All of the three properties of this class are optional performance tuning properties and are used as-is to set the properties corePoolSize, maximumPoolSize and keepAliveTime of the ThreadPoolExecutor.

Since:
1.0
See Also:

Constructor Detail

StandaloneFileSystemConfiguration

public StandaloneFileSystemConfiguration(String xaDiskHome,
                                         String instanceId)
This is the sole constructor for this configuration object, and accepts the two mandatory configuration properties for XADisk.

Parameters:
xaDiskHome - path of the XADisk System directory. See the description of setXaDiskHome.
instanceId - instance-id of the XADisk instance. See the description of FileSystemConfiguration.setInstanceId(java.lang.String).
